screens.label: Assisted Sales Bill To Contact Check

fields.name: Assisted_Sales_Bill_To_Contact_Fields_Check
fields.fieldText: WARNING: Before running the Assisted Sales UI you will need to the following fields to be present on your Opportunity's Bill To Contact: Email, Account, Street, Postcode and Country. The referenced Account should have Billing Country set too.

screens.label: Assisted Sales Call Item Contact Check

fields.name: Assisted_Sales_Contact_Fields_Check
fields.fieldText: WARNING: Before running the Assisted Sales UI you will need to the following fields to be present on your Call Item's Contact: Email, Account, Street, Postcode and Country. The referenced Account should have Billing Country set too.

fields.name: Assisted_Sales_Locale_Check_Warning
fields.fieldText: WARNING: Before running the Assisted Sales UI you will need a Locale to be set (on Account).

fields.name: Assisted_Sales_User_Check
fields.fieldText: WARNING: Before running the Assisted Sales UI you will need your Email and Federation Id populated on your User record, as well as membership of one of the Assisted Sales Groups.

fields.name: ContactNotSpecified
fields.fieldText: Error: The Call Item should be associated with a Contact before creating an SBC Opportunity.

fields.name: UserInstruction
fields.fieldText: An Opportunity is created and future changes and activities should be managed against the Opportunity and not against this Call Item.

fields.name: WinLossErrorValidation
fields.fieldText: Must provide a reason for Closed Won/Lost opportunities. Please go back and fill out the Win/Loss Reasons.
